title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: Updates improvements encouranged via PRs! Updates citable published source. -line aim package source generic costing estimates therefore broadly representative costing given intervention, focussed specific location implementation approach. suggested update include: 1. update costing function deafault value. 2. Updated documentation function including citable source references section. 3. Corresponding update unit tests modified costing function.

text: n_doses Number RTS,S doses rtss_cost_per_dose Cost per RTS,S dose rtss_cosumables_cost Cost consumables one dose (e.g injection reconstitution syringes, safety box etc.) rtss_delivery_cost Cost delivery one dose

title: Cost RTS,S — cost_rtss
text: RTS,S costs

title: Cost RTS,S — cost_rtss
text: rtss_cost_per_dose Current default middle value commonly used assumed range dose costs ($2, $5, $10). true cost per currently unknown. Penny et al (2016) https://www.thelancet.com/journals/lancet/article/PIIS0140-6736(15)00725-4/fulltext. rtss_cosumables_cost Penny et al (2016) https://www.thelancet.com/journals/lancet/article/PIIS0140-6736(15)00725-4/fulltext. rtss_delivery_cost Current default recurring economic cost delivery per dose MVIP. Full Evidence Report RTS,S/AS01 Malaria Vaccine (2021) https://cdn..int/media/docs/default-source/immunization/mvip/full-evidence-report---rtss-as01-malaria-vaccine--sage-mpag-(sept2021).pdf?sfvrsn=c9737be_5.

title: Cost SMC — cost_smc
text: SMC costs

title: Cost SMC — cost_smc
text: smc_cost_per_dose_delivered Current default average economic cost administering four monthly   SMC cycles across seven countries Sahel subregion   (Burkina Faso, Chad, Guinea, Mali, Niger, Nigeria, Gambia)   2016. include multiple delivery methods (door door, fixed point,    mobile point, mixed). cost per dose delivered average cost    four monthly SMC cycles divided number cycles (3.63 / 4). Costs    2016 USD$. Gilmartin et al (2021) https://www.thelancet.com/journals/langlo/article/PIIS2214-109X(20)30475-7/fulltext.
